bibl.title: Fragments from the Cartonnage of P75.
bibl.note: Reports on unpublished fragments of Luke and John seen on photographs made by the British Museum while conserving the leather binding of P75 [= P. Bodmer XIV-XV (= van Haelst 406; LDAB 2895)].
bibl.seg: James M. Robinson, Fragments from the Cartonnage of P75.
Reports on unpublished fragments of Luke and John seen on photographs made by the British Museum while conserving the leather binding of P75 [= P. Bodmer XIV-XV (= van Haelst 406; LDAB 2895)].
